sect1.title: Example Cisco ASA Deployment
sect1.para: This Getting Started Guide demonstrates how to configure a Cisco ASA 5505 to match the network deployment shown in the diagram below.

The goal of this Getting Started Guide is to familiarize users with the basic Firewall Builder steps needed to configure a Cisco ASA or PIX firewall object. There are many advanced features that won't be covered here, please refer to the Users Guide for a complete listing of all Firewall Builder features.
